EntryCollection.Author: Bhopal City Store
EntryCollection.Text: Hi Jibin, We would like to inform you that, Our Company 'Bhopal City Store', is moving one step further and planning to open new store in next city Jamshedpur. So, in the matter of planning and brain Storming, we have meeting on 20th fabruary 2023. Thank uou

EntryCollection.Author: Suraj Prakash
EntryCollection.Text: DB City mall Hi Jibin, We have increased some of products price. We are sending you new price list of product. Here is our product list

EntryCollection.Author: Bhopal City Store
EntryCollection.Text: Hi Shubham, Your Bonus for this Year is deposited to your account. Thnak you for your all your hard work and trust on company.

EntryCollection.Author: Sushant Rajan
EntryCollection.Text: Aashima Anupama Mall - Hi Jibin, We are sorry to inform you thant we cannot proceed your order, as we have already shortage of that product which you have order. I will inform you when product is available. I hope you will understand our problem Thank you.

EntryCollection.Author: Suraj Prakash
EntryCollection.Text: DB City mall - Hellow, Jibin, we are happy to receive new order from your store. I would like to confirm that your order is confirmed. It will be delieved on 29th fabruary. Thank you
